Hero.Title: Sharjah Fish Resource Authority
Hero.Description: To develop fisheries, empower fishermen, and enhance partnerships to achieve sustainable food security and economic growth.

Card1.Title: Our Vision
Card1.Description: Leading in the fields of fisheries locally.

Card2.Title: Our Mission
Card2.Description: To develop fisheries, empower fishermen, and enhance partnerships to achieve sustainable food security and economic growth.

Value1.title: Responsibility
Value1.description: We recognize our individual responsibilities and competencies and fulfill our assigned tasks with high quality and efficiency.

Value2.title: Transparency
Value2.description: Conducting business with clarity, honesty, and openness.

Value3.title: Creativity & Innovation
Value3.description: Encouraging and fostering creative thinking and innovation in daily work, strategies, and continuous improvement of processes, requiring forward-thinking.

Value4.title: Quality & Excellence
Value4.description: Achieving tangible results that contribute to improved performance and effective achievement of goals.

Value5.title: Teamwork
Value5.description: Interaction and collaboration among team members to achieve common goals and enhance collective performance to overcome challenges and achieve success.

Management.Title: His Excellency Ali Ahmed Ali Abu Ghazeen
Management.Subtitle: Senior Management of the Sharjah Fish Resource Authority
Management.Description: Member of the Executive Council, Chairman of the Sharjah Fish Resource Authority Authority. His responsibilities include developing and implementing local strategies and plans aimed at enhancing food and water security for the Emirate of Sharjah and preserving and sustaining the marine environment.

specialization1.Title: Policy Development
specialization1.Description: Develop general policies and strategic plans for the authority in the emirate and present them to the Executive Council for appropriate decision.

specialization2.Title: Legislation Proposals
specialization2.Description: Propose necessary legislation and regulations related to the Authorityâ€™s work and present them to the Executive Council for appropriate decisions.

specialization3.Title: Association Oversight
specialization3.Description: Oversee fishermen's associations and monitor fishing activities in the emirate.

specialization4.Title: Fisheries Development
specialization4.Description: Work on developing fisheries in collaboration with fishermen's associations and relevant authorities.

specialization5.Title: Issue Research & Solutions
specialization5.Description: Research, study, and propose solutions to any issues related to fisheries.

specialization6.Title: Awareness Campaigns
specialization6.Description: Raise awareness of the importance of preserving fisheries through available means and coordinate with relevant authorities in all matters related to fisheries.

specialization7.Title: Contract Management
specialization7.Description: Enter into contracts, agreements, and memorandums of understanding and partnerships after approval by the Executive Council.

specialization8.Title: Support & Collaboration
specialization8.Description: Seek administrative and technical support from specialized entities, and consult experts and specialists in all matters related to its work, and collaborate with other entities in matters falling within its objectives and specializations.

specialization9.Title: Emirate Representation
specialization9.Description: Represent the emirate in all local, regional, and international conferences and meetings.

specialization10.Title: Maritime Participation
specialization10.Description: Participate in all maritime activities and festivals within and outside the emirate.

specialization11.Title: Other Specializations
specialization11.Description: Undertake any other specializations assigned by the ruler or the Executive Council.

Contact.Title: Still have questions?
Contact.Description: Reach out for personalized assistance to know more.

Strategic.Title: Strategic Goals
Strategic.Subtitle: Sharjah Fish Resource Authority (2024-2028)
Strategic.Description: The Strategic Goals of the Sharjah Fish Resource Authority (2024-2028) aim to foster sustainable fisheries, empower fishermen with modern techniques, and create robust industry infrastructure. The Authority will optimize systems, innovate environments, and harness human talent, striving for self-sufficiency through sustainable resource management and marine preservation, ensuring food security for the emirate.

Goal1.Title: Sustainable Fisheries
Goal1.Description: Achieve sustainable development of fisheries and strategic partnerships, and empower fishermen with modern techniques according to best practices and distinguished services, contributing to the creation of a supportive infrastructure for leadership in fisheries in the emirate

Goal2.Title: Process Optimization
Goal2.Description: Improve internal systems, processes, and technical procedures according to best practices and monitor and control their quality and efficiency.

Goal3.Title: Innovative Environments
Goal3.Description: Create innovative and high-quality environments, utilizing resources and investing in human talents and competencies

Goal4.Title: Human Resource Development
Goal4.Description: Employ and enhance the capabilities of human resources and work teams.

Goal6.Title: Financial Efficiency
Goal6.Description: Sustain financial resources, manage assets, and enhance financial efficiency and effectiveness.

Goal7.Title: Self-Sufficiency
Goal7.Description: Achieve the Authorityâ€™s self-sufficiency by utilizing and investing in fisheries resources and preserving the marine environment to provide sustainable food security in the emirate.

Development.Title: Sustainable Development Goals
Development.Subtitle: Sharjah Fish Resource Authority (2024-2028)
Development.Description: In line with UAE Vision 2021, the Sharjah Fish Resource Authority, in collaboration with federal and local specialized entities, works to achieve goals 3, 4, 8, 9, 14, and 17 of the Sustainable Development Goals by implementing several projects aimed at preserving marine ecosystems and natural resources and ensuring their sustainability
